Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a string telephone setup between two students, showing how they can communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can indicate that the device uses sound waves to send information along the string.
The student can show that the string is taut to demonstrate the importance of tension for communication.
The student can identify the materials used to make the string telephone in the drawing.
The student can illustrate or label how the communication device works to solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
